name: horizontal-video-testimonials
description: A section with a listing of horizontal video cards, with a section title and link to watch more.

sectionConfiguration.title: Section Configuration
sectionConfiguration.description: The heading for the section, appearing above the grid of cards. If the title is empty, the heading and call to action link will be hidden.

ctaUrl.title: Matrix asset link
ctaUrl.description: Select an Matrix asset/page to link to.

ctaManualUrl.title: External/Manual link
ctaManualUrl.description: Enter the full URL, including https://. If this field is filled out, it will be used instead of the Matrix asset link.

bgImage.title: Background image
bgImage.description: Select a background image for the section. A dark overlay will be applied over the image.

marginTop.title: Spacing above (top margin)
marginTop.description: Add spacing above the section. 'Base' is the smallest with '10' (default) being the largest option. Selecting 'default' will use the default site-wide vertical spacing between components.

marginBottom.title: Spacing below (bottom margin)
marginBottom.description: Add spacing below the section. 'Base' is the smallest with '10' (default) being the largest option. Selecting 'default' will use the default site-wide vertical spacing between components.

testimonials.title: Video Testimonials
testimonials.description: Enter the details for each video testimonial card.

videoImage.title: Video preview image
videoImage.description: Select an image to use as the video preview. The aspect ratio of the image displayed will be 16x9.

youtubeId.title: Youtube video ID
youtubeId.description: Enter the video ID from YouTube.

internalStoryUrl.title: Story link (Matrix asset link)
internalStoryUrl.description: Select a Matrix page/asset to link to. If you prefer to paste the full URL manually, use the 'External/Manual story link' field below instead.

manualStoryUrl.title: External/Manual story link
manualStoryUrl.description: Enter the full URL, including https://. A diagonal arrow icon will be automatically applied after the card heading link if the URL does not contain news.stanford.edu.
